home-features.title: Deploy your GitHub repository to powerful infrastucture in a few clicks
home-features.text: Connect your GitHub account and set up your project in a few simple steps. Git push new code and we’ll instantly update it by connecting it to the GitHub Actions pipeline.

home-hero.description: Connect your GitHub account and instantly deploy your static web projects on DDoS-protected, georedundant, green IONOS infrastructure.

getting-started.title: Getting started
getting-started.text: How to connect a repository and set up a deployment.

deploy-sample.text: Setup a deployment with one of our framework samples.

home-team.overline: We are the team - We are deploy now
home-team.title:
Developed just for devs:
Meet the IONOS experts behind Deploy Now

home-workflow.title: The ideal workflow for you, your team and your clients
home-workflow.text: Want to preview changes before they go live? Simply set up multiple feature branches as staging deployments. View changes live via a preview link before merging them back.

about-us.title:
Hi there!
We're the Deploy Now team.
about-us.text: Our company asked us to build a product that we’d use ourselves, so we did. Our mission is to connect the GitHub community to the powerful hosting platform that we engineered in-house.
about-us.ionos-text: Headquartered in Germany, IONOS offers web hosting, domain and cloud products in Europe and North America. IONOS manages more than 8 million customer contracts and hosts over 12 million domains in its own regional data centers. Customers in all markets have access to free, personal 24/7 support in their own language.
about-us.feedback-text: Got ideas or missing a feature? We’re still working on Deploy Now and would love to hear what you think. Use the feedback button in the product or send an email to info@deploynow.dev.
